full_text:
Pillboxes!! KC offense vs Denver. The 2PT try was the failed PAT. Jet narrowly edged out Pacheco for most RB snaps. Pacheco only had 1 third down snap. MVS led WR's snaps. JuJu I think was sacrificed to Surtain this week. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/3tGravUF5x

Defense. Sneed went out for a drive in the 4th, replaced by Williams. Drive ended in TD. Gay *mostly* lost the 3rd drive to Harris, as usual. For being run stuffers, Williams and Nnadi were in for a lot of pass plays. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/Zt7rzbARKC

Here's Denvers charts. They too had an OL who went out. Chiefs FA acquisition in 2024 Jerry Jeudy (I'm manifesting this) had a nice game again. Lamar Jackson's name came up a lot in this game, probably because Surtain was ignored. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/omkioeYQgL

Added EPA/Play from All QB Rushes

Bar is Rushing EPA/play
Logo is Overall EPA/play

Highest Added EPA/Play from rushes:
1) Fields: +0.13
2) Hurts: +0.11
3) Lamar +0.09
4) Allen +0.08
5) Jones +0.07

#nflverse https://t.co/OH73lEvm2s

NFL Cornerback Receiving Yards allowed per Target vs. Forced Incompletion Rate (data from @PFF):

- Sauce Gardner is ridiculous, DROY without a doubt
- Ravens secondary has struggled
- Darious Williams was an underrated offseason signing by the Jags

#nflverse https://t.co/Ahqs5jspfq
